name: Zombie Cop
description:
This is a game designed to test the PS5 Dualsense controller on a PC. This game supports the adaptive trigger of the dualsense controller. 

This game uses DSX to support the adaptive triggers on a PC. 

Requirements

1. Install DSX on your PC. [ Follow the instructions on the page to install ]

2. Make sure DSX is running in background while playing this game. 

Controls 

For non controller players

  • AWSD - Movement
  • Mouse - Look/Aim
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire 
  • Right Mouse Button - ADS
  • T - Inspect
  • R - Reload 
  • Shift + AWSD - Run
  • Mouse Scroll - Change Weapon
